metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000122 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The UNIX IPC layer in WebKit, including WebKitGTK+ prior to 2.16.3, doesnot properly validate certain message metadata, allowing a compromisedsecondary process to cause a denial of service (release assertion) of theUI process. This vulnerability does not affect Apple products.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.16.6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.16.6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.16.6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.16.6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.16.6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.16.6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
